summary: An ordinance amending Section 9 of Ordinance No. 45382, as heretofore amended, and adding thereto two new sections to be known respectively as Section 2-J and Section 17-K, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts, or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923.
